reviews.text: A very simple, single platform station with trains to and from Aberystwyth and inland towards Birmingham. The station itself is unmanned but the station museum will have volunteers inside.

What can I say about 4 it's right by Aberystwyth and it's a little holiday place where there are numerous caravans shops guest houses and fish and chip.  we were staying in clarach bay and walked around to both and have fish and chips on the beach.
It is a place steeped with heritage, and the museum even more so!

I was lucky enough to catch a late train from Tokyo to Borth last week, a popular commute. When I arrived there were some interesting clouds for which I have to thank the town of Borth for providing. Some of the clouds were directly above the train station so I had a magnificent view. I can now head back to Japan with some fond memories of Borth train station.
